content: to help make them sharp be careful or you ll go through the stitches and have to sew them again iron again then stitch the opening closed invisibly well almost fold the entire piece in half shortening it to the size in the picture gather with sewing thread in center big running stitches wrap the thread around twice and sew onto the elastic band sew rosette from the back side onto the center done knitted bow c/o 12 stitches and knit in garter stitch all knit until 2 25 inches long decrease row *k2tog across row increase row increase in each stitch by knitting into the front and back of each stitch across the row finish continue in garter stitch until same length as other side or 10 ridges not counting the decrease/increase row bind off loosely sew in ends between the last 2 row invisibly take a piece of yarn approximately 15 inches long and thread through all stitches at the center see the holes pull wrap around center twice and tie together around the elastic in back sew with thread if needed make 3 french knots winding yarn around 4 times for a big size down the center done i hope you enjoyed making these yes you may make and sell them i hope they re successful for you please remember i do this for donations to prevent suicide and for the salvation army to help people when they are at their lowest please donate if you re able i truly appreciate it copyright 2025 barbara hurd copyright 2025 barbara hurd
